name: The Laplacian 2 - A Platformer Game
description:
Aliens have taken over the world's oil refineries and continue to produce life forms there for the conquest of the earth. You have to take back the refineries and fight your way through the 25 levels.

In the second Jump & Run "The Laplacian 2" implemented by Godot, you simply have to reach the goal for each level. This time, to be fair, there are also checkpoints in the levels. At the beginning there is 1 training level in which you get to know the most important elements. Levels 10, 20, and 25 are boss levels. In the level selection you can play levels that have already been unlocked again and look at the achievements. In order to unlock a level, you must have reached the goal of the previous level. There is also a display of additional extra quests for each level. In addition to collecting all the coins, you also have to beat a certain amount of time. The soundtrack is largely based on the soundtrack of the first part - and is available as a maxi single "The Laplacian" by Mickey Santos on Spotify, Amazon and co. on 11.3. appear. The second part also offers two languages to choose from, German and English.
